code: import axios from'axios';var BASE_URL="https://61b2b99ac8d4640017aaf4af.mockapi.io/";export var getProductsApi=function getProductsApi(){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/Products"));};export var getProductsIdApi=function getProductsIdApi(productId){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/Products/").concat(productId));};export var createProductsApi=function createProductsApi(product){return axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/Products"),product);};
